title: Rani's Grace: Pink Sapphire, Tanzanite & Emerald Dangler Earrings
features: A contemporary take on a classic design. Features a prominent pink sapphire surmounting a teardrop Tanzanite. Dainty emerald and seed pearl drops complete the look with a gentle sway. The gemstones are set in an open setting which showcases maximum light and brilliance.
occasions: and even traditional occasions like a sangeeth. A unique piece that is fit for a queen!
description: A beautiful blend of heritage gemstones with a light and easy to wear structure.
